rule: If you are in need you shall take from the others.

dialogues.AniD1: If my neighbor is blessed with plenty, why should I not share on her wealth?
dialogues.AniD2: Violence is wrong but thievery never hurt a soul.
dialogues.AniD3: Kings and merchants are the embodiment of greed, they will share, willingly or not...
dialogues.AniD4: Laws serve only to protect those who write them, the liberation of wealth should never be a crime.
